attributes.action: Compel the Prime Minister to answer questions directly at PMQs
attributes.additional_details: The current format of PMQs allows both obfuscation and distraction which erodes confidence in the integrity of the government.
attributes.background: Simply be more transparent and honest about key issues (perhaps with exception of national security).

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker personally, and the Prime Minister is responsible for answers to questions.
